text: Serge Haroche (born 11 September 1944) is a French physicist. He won 2012 Nobel Prize for Physics with David J. Wineland for "ground-breaking experimental methods that enable measuring and manipulation of individual quantum systems". ==References== Category:1944 births Category:Living people Category:Moroccan scientists Category:French physicists Category:People from Casablanca
title: Serge Haroche
